snippet: Japanese leaders reacted angrily on Friday after the police on Okinawa said a United States Air Force serviceman was suspected of assaulting a 13-year-old boy.
abstract: Japanese leaders react angrily after police on Okinawa say an American Air Force serviceman is suspected of breaking into an apartment while drunk and punching a 13-year-old boy; incident comes just weeks after two American sailors were accused of raping a woman on the island.
lead_paragraph: Japanese leaders reacted angrily on Friday after the police on Okinawa said a United States Air Force serviceman was suspected of assaulting a 13-year-old boy.

headline.seo: U.S. Airman Is Suspected of Punching Japanese Boy
headline.main: U.S. Airman Is Suspected of Punching Japanese Boy, Police Say
headline.print_headline: U.S. Airman on Okinawa Punched Boy, Japanese Say

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
